channel.title: Drilling on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Drilling on Universal

item.title: E02138
item.description: Terex-Halco 43-22 crawler drill, Cummins 8.3ltr engine, Onboard compressor, 4mtr drill rods, 6 rods carousel, all pins and bushings on mast are replaced, hoses from drill head to dust collector are replaced, many oil hoses are replaced, all repair pictures are available on request, undercarriage has approx. 90% remaining, 400mm pads. Machine has been workshop tested, repaired, has new paint and is in clean condition.

item.title: E02604
item.description: Speedstar SS2500/SS40 water drilling rig, mounted on heavy duty oilfield tandem axle trailer with Leveling Jacks, Triple Drum Draw Works, Twin (2) Detroit diesel 471 Deck engines with manual transmission, 18 inch rotary table, 18m hydraulically raised mast, (Mast replaced in 2010), with hook block, swivel, operators control station and console, new 11.00-20 tyres. This drilling rig has new paint, is repaired and is in clean condition. Truck is not included.

item.title: E02937
item.description: 2001 Hausherr Viper H Series crawler drill rig, c/w enclosed operator cabin, suitable for Down The Hole drilling up to 150mm diamater hole, 81kw Caterpillar/Perkins engine, 4.6m drill mast lenght, 40kn pull down force, 40kn withdrawal force, can take 76-95mm rods, 8 rod carousel, rig has gone through the workshop with many components repaired/replaced where applicable. All repair pictures are available upon request. We have a range of mobile diesel air compressors available to suit if necessary.

item.title: E03829
item.description: New & Unused Ingersoll Rand ECM350 towed wagon drill, c/w IR DTH rotary head, can drill 85 mm to 127mm holes and capacity up to 150m deep, set up for down the hole (DTH) rotation drilling, 3,900 Nm Torque @ 8 bar 10,000LB pullback, takes 3m rods, rig weight 5,443 Kg, 300mm Track Shoes, manifold for water injection, safety check valves on main cylinders.** Drill rods, hammers, tooling etc. can be supplied to customers specification at extra cost on request.

item.title: E04405
item.description: Ingersoll Rand CM780D Crawler Rock Drill, Cab with airconditioning, Remanufactured 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C12 engine with 425HP (317kW), automatic rod changer, pull back force 45.530 N, 2-stage rotary screw air compressor, dust collector + pres cyclone, central grease system, rear view camera, undercarriage on average 80% remaining, 350mm pads, all pipes and drill head included, operating weight 21.000 Kgs, CE marked. 3.428 engine hours, 9.809 Drill hours. Machine is workshop tested and is in good and clean condition.

item.title: E04406
item.description: Atlas Copco CM780D Crawler Rock Drill, Cab with airconditioning, Remanufactured 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C13 engine with 445HP (317kW) 0 Hours! Automatic rod changer, pull back force 45.530 N, 2-stage rotary screw air compressor, dust collector + pres cyclone, incl. drill rods, rear view camera, undercarriage on average 75% remaining, 350mm pads, operating weight 22.230 Kgs, CE marked. 6.524 machine hours, 3.424 drill hours. Machine is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04576
item.description: AMS PowerProbe 9635 Geotechnical core drill, drill has only 1014 working hours, PTO powered, 175ft lb hydraulic hammer, high speed auger, high pressure pump, 10’ x 15” drill rod, direct push sampling, side-to-side and in-and-out slide base, hollow stem capabilities, 2-speed 5000 ft lb auger drive head, 80” probe stroke for use of up to 5’ tooling, 2400 psi-12GPM pump, hydraulic oil cooler, 33000 lb push down force, 47500 lb pull back force, adjustable mast for angled probing & drilling.

item.title: E04762
item.description: New & Unused Ingersoll Rand Drilling Package, Ingersoll Rand ECM350 towed wagon drill, c/w IR DTH rotary head, can drill 85 mm to 127mm holes and capacity up to 150m deep, set up for down the hole (DTH) rotation drilling, 3,900 Nm Torque @ 8 bar 10,000LB pullback, takes 3.1mtr rods, rig weight 5,443 Kg, 300mm track shoes, manifold for water injection, safety check valves on main cylinders, Unused Doosan/Ingersoll-Rand SHP650 High Capacity Portable Air Compressor, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cummins 6CTA8.
